## derefContext variable

Takes an arbitrary `ctx` object and array of `keys`<!-- -->. Attempts to call `.deref()` on all given keys' values and stores result values instead of original. Returns updated copy of `ctx` or original if `ctx` is `null` or no keys were given.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
derefContext: (ctx: any, keys: (string | number | symbol)[] | undefined) => any
```
